channel.title: Cyber Security on UNKNOWN SPACE
channel.description: Recent content in Cyber Security on UNKNOWN SPACE

item.title: Cyber Security - Basics
item.description: Currently in our world, there are a huge amount of attacks occurring everyday, bringing unpredictable loss to individuals, organizations or even governments. Such attacks could be: Malware, Ransomware, Adware, Hacking, Spoofing, Phishing, Pharming, DDoS… It is important that we care about security in the development of anything. In definition, there are three aspects in security, which are confidentiality, Integrity and Availability. CIA Triad Confidentiality The confidentiality contains two definitions, data confidentiality and privacy.
